events.description: Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) of Germany receives a pass on the edge of the penalty area, takes a skillful touch to control the ball, and then strikes a low shot with his right foot into the bottom right corner of the goal, past the diving Portuguese goalkeeper.
Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) celebrates his goal, pointing to the crowd with a grin, as his teammates congratulate him.
Replay showing Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) dribbling with the ball in the attacking third, evading a challenge from a Portuguese defender with close control.
Replay showing Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) taking a right-footed shot from just inside the penalty area, sending the ball towards the goal.
Replay with a close-up angle showing the ball cleanly hitting the back of the net as the Portuguese goalkeeper (Ricardo) attempts a desperate dive to his right.
Wider angle replay showing Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) receiving the ball outside the box and driving into the penalty area towards the goal.
Replay from a different camera angle showing Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) striking the ball with precision into the goal, with the goalkeeper unable to make the save.
Replay showing Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) skillfully dribbling past an initial Portuguese defender with quick footwork in the midfield.
Replay showing Bastian Schweinsteiger (7) performing a body feint to successfully evade a sliding tackle attempt from a second Portuguese defender before continuing his run forward.

In live action, Player #7 (white jersey) takes a powerful low shot from just outside the penalty area, aiming towards the right side of the goal. The opposing goalkeeper (blue jersey) makes a full-stretch diving save to his right, successfully deflecting the ball away from the net.

A replay of the goal-scoring sequence begins. Player #7 (white jersey) receives the ball near the edge of the penalty box, takes a skillful touch to control it, and then unleashes a powerful low-driven shot with his right foot from approximately 18 yards out, sending the ball past the diving goalkeeper (blue jersey) into the bottom right corner of the net.

Another replay shows Player #7 (white jersey) performing intricate dribbling at speed in the attacking third. He evades multiple Portuguese defenders (red jerseys), including a quick move past Player #17, demonstrating excellent close control and agility before setting up the shot that resulted in the goal.

A replay from behind the goal captures the ball hitting the back of the net following Player #7's shot, with the goalkeeper (blue jersey) on the ground unable to make the save. The camera then pans slightly to show Player #7 (white jersey) celebrating the successful goal.

In a celebratory replay, Player #7 (white jersey), the goal scorer, is seen embracing and being heartily congratulated by his teammate, Player #5 (white jersey), on the field, both players smiling broadly in joy.
